languages.text: Милостью Императора мне поручено вести хронику похода, который мо{mf|й|я} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, Лорд-капитан {name}, намерен{mf||а} предпринять сквозь замутившееся варп-пространство Зева. Страх перед грядущим наполняет наши души, но все мы уповаем на свет Императора, да пребудет с нами Его защита.

traits.locale_text: Милостью Императора мне поручено вести хронику похода, который мо{mf|й|я} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, Лорд-капитан {name}, намерен{mf||а} предпринять сквозь замутившееся варп-пространство Зева. Страх перед грядущим наполняет наши души, но все мы уповаем на свет Императора, да пребудет с нами Его защита.

languages.text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.
languages.original_text: Милостью Императора мне поручено вести хронику похода, который мо{mf|й|я} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, Лорд-капитан {name}, намерен{mf||а} предпринять сквозь замутившееся варп-пространство Зева. Страх перед грядущим наполняет наши души, но все мы уповаем на свет Императора, да пребудет с нами Его защита.

traits.locale_text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

languages.text: Por la gracia del Emperador, se me ha encomendado la crónica del viaje que mi inestimable comandante, {mf|el|la} bendit{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} {name}, planea realizar a través de una región de la disformidad especialmente turbulenta conocida como las Fauces. Pensar en lo que nos espera nos aterra, pero confiamos en la luz del Emperador y rezamos para que nos proteja.
languages.original_text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

traits.locale_text: Por la gracia del Emperador, se me ha encomendado la crónica del viaje que mi inestimable comandante, {mf|el|la} bendit{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} {name}, planea realizar a través de una región de la disformidad especialmente turbulenta conocida como las Fauces. Pensar en lo que nos espera nos aterra, pero confiamos en la luz del Emperador y rezamos para que nos proteja.

languages.text: 在帝皇的恩典下，我负责记录神圣的指挥官，领主舰长{name}的旅途纪事。领主舰长打算穿过被称为“巨口”的亚空间湍流。一想到即将面对的事情，我的灵魂中便充满了恐惧，但我们都相信帝皇的光辉，愿祂的庇护与我们同在。
languages.original_text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

traits.locale_text: 在帝皇的恩典下，我负责记录神圣的指挥官，领主舰长{name}的旅途纪事。领主舰长打算穿过被称为“巨口”的亚空间湍流。一想到即将面对的事情，我的灵魂中便充满了恐惧，但我们都相信帝皇的光辉，愿祂的庇护与我们同在。

languages.text: 皇帝のお恵みにより、我が祝福されし司令のロード・キャプテンである{name}様が、マウと呼ばれる歪みの先を見通せぬような道を通過する際の航海記録の任務を与えられた。この先に何が待っているのか考えると、我々の魂は恐怖で満たされる。だが、我々は皆、皇帝の光を信じている。主のご加護が我々と共にあらんことを。
languages.original_text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝のお恵みにより、我が祝福されし司令のロード・キャプテンである{name}様が、マウと呼ばれる歪みの先を見通せぬような道を通過する際の航海記録の任務を与えられた。この先に何が待っているのか考えると、我々の魂は恐怖で満たされる。だが、我々は皆、皇帝の光を信じている。主のご加護が我々と共にあらんことを。

languages.text: Durch die Gnade des Imperators wurde ich beauftragt, über die Reise zu berichten, die mein gesegneter Kommandant, Lord Captain {name}, durch den trüben Bereich des Warp, der als Schlund bekannt ist, zu unternehmen beabsichtigt. Der Gedanke an das, was vor uns liegt, erfüllt unsere Seelen mit Schrecken, aber wir alle vertrauen auf das Licht des Imperators, möge sein Schutz jetzt mit uns sein.
languages.original_text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

languages.text: Par la grâce de l'Empereur, j'ai été mandaté pour relater le périple que notre {mf|commandant béni|commandante bénie}, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} {name}, a l'intention d'entreprendre à travers cette zone turbulente du Warp que l'on appelle la Gueule. La simple évocation ce qui nous attend nous glace d'effroi, mais notre foi en la lumière de l'Empereur nous protège.
languages.original_text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

traits.locale_text: Par la grâce de l'Empereur, j'ai été mandaté pour relater le périple que notre {mf|commandant béni|commandante bénie}, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} {name}, a l'intention d'entreprendre à travers cette zone turbulente du Warp que l'on appelle la Gueule. La simple évocation ce qui nous attend nous glace d'effroi, mais notre foi en la lumière de l'Empereur nous protège.

languages.text: Kutsanmış kumandanım Lord Kaptan {name}, Ağız olarak bilinen çalkantılı öteboyut alanından geçme niyetinde olup İmparator'un lütfuyla bu yolculuğu kayıt altına almakla görevlendirilmiş bulunuyorum. Bizi nelerin beklediğinin düşüncesi bile ruhlarımızı dehşet içinde bırakmaya yetiyor ancak hepimizin İmparator'un ışığına inancı tam. O'nun himayesi yanımızda olsun.
languages.original_text: By the grace of the Emperor, I have been charged with chronicling the voyage that my blessed commander, Lord Captain {name}, intends to undertake through that turbid tract of the warp known as the Maw. The thought of what lies ahead fills our souls with terror, but we all have faith in the light of the Emperor, may His protection be with us now.

traits.locale_text: Kutsanmış kumandanım Lord Kaptan {name}, Ağız olarak bilinen yoğun öteboyut bölgesine yolculuk etme niyetinde olup İmparator'un lütfuyla bu yolculuğu kayıt altına almakla görevlendirilmiş bulunuyorum. Bizi nelerin beklediğini düşünmek bile ruhlarımızı dehşet içinde bırakmaya yetiyor ancak hepimizin İmparator'un ışığına inancı tam. O'nun koruması yanımızda olsun.
